Html:
I would really like to see this item: Work Issue worked on as soon as possible.  The longer it is delayed, the hard it is going to be to refactor.

Any thoughts?

Thanks for the feedback trevor, it is being worked on right now (well, not right now... it is nearly 3am here). We were out for the holidays, but we've read a lot of community feedback and we are working on making the appropriate changes.
